name: Two Button Midterm
description:
Details

  • You play as the Power Cannon, and have the objective to destroy all the targets to achieve victory!
  • The Idea behind this is to have a Two-button game. Think "Game-boy without the directional pad". UI does not count towards the button requirements, but the game-play should be restricted to two buttons.

IN-PROGRESS

  • Still trying to figure the shoot mechanic to shoot upon holding left and right buttons. Have a shoot button until then.
